objects.text:
• Premium synthetic leather construction
• Enhanced grip technology with deep
  channel design
• All-weather durability for indoor
  and outdoor courts

product_details.name: Premium Pro-Grip Basketball - Competition Grade Indoor/Outdoor Performance Ball
product_details.description:
• Official size regulation basketball with premium synthetic leather construction
• Enhanced grip technology with deep channel design for superior ball control
• Distinctive dual-tone yellow stripe pattern for improved visibility during play
• All-weather durability suitable for both indoor and outdoor courts
• Professional-grade moisture-wicking surface maintains consistent performance
• Optimized ball texture for precise shooting and handling
• Superior air retention technology for lasting shape and bounce
• Competition-standard size and weight specifications
• Perfect for training, recreational play, and competitive matches
• High-contrast design helps track ball rotation during shots

banner_details:
The banner features a bold and energetic sports advertisement layout with a modern, high-contrast aesthetic. The background is split between a deep gradient navy and black tone with abstract swooshes and circles, adding a sense of motion. The left side features multiple text layers starting with a bold, white uppercase heading (`heading`), followed by a yellow product title (`product_title`) and an orange-yellow tagline (`tagline`), emphasizing performance. Below, a white bulleted feature list (`description`) details the key product specs. A white subheading (`subheading`) reinforces professionalism, while a bright orange call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled with a white text (`cta`) urges immediate action. A final tag line in bold yellow (`tagline_2`) reinforces product benefit. The right side prominently displays a realistic basketball image (`product_image`), making it product-focused and dynamic in visual appeal.  

**Color Palette:**  
- Midnight Navy (#1A1A30)  
- Deep Indigo (#2D2D4A)  
- Bright Orange (#FF6B00)  
- Gold Yellow (#FFD600)  
- Soft Orange Gradient (#FF9D00 - #FFEA80)  
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The basketball in the image features a bold and dynamic color palette primarily consisting of deep maroon (#6C1E1E) and vibrant yellow (#FFD700). The maroon base gives the product a rich, textured look, representing strength and durability, while the bright yellow stripes provide striking contrast and act as highlights, drawing the viewer's attention and adding energy to the design. The black dividing line (#000000) adds definition between sections, enhancing its structural appeal. The colors are well-blended through natural gradients and shading on the ball's pebbled surface, allowing light reflection to amplify the dimensional contrast. This palette gives a premium and sporty feel.
